params.subalignment: Pale Moon Circus (yes pale moon circus is the full subalignment) (cope)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Invite players to your show.
- Destroy a player's home for space for your circus.
- Destroy a player for your circus. Only usable when the show begins.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your show begins Day 5. All players you invited are roleblocked that night.
- Destroying a player's house forces them to select another player. That player may choose to accept or decline their request. If they decline, the first player must choose a different player, but if they accept, the first player moves into the second player's house. The first player is no longer a valid target to visit (but they can still be voted, and this is public), and all visits to the second player also apply to the first player. The person that the first player moved into with isn't public.
- If you have a problem with the subalignment being so long, don't name your factions so long.
